snippet.title: Rags to Dishes | VR Cooking Has Never Been This Hectic
snippet.description:
Steam 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1442300/Rags_to_Dishes/
Viveport
https://www.viveport.com/4143f88e-7805-4182-9916-decb3d2e4cbf

In a medieval kingdom far, far away, a courageous cook lives, unaware of the monumental challenge they’re about to take on.
You are about to embark on a journey like no other…

In our brand new, medieval-themed VR cooking game, you’ll play as a brave and ambitious chef – cooking your way through multiple different stages in order to impress the Royal court. Each stage is more complex than the last, with exciting and complicated recipes, that require a dash of hard work and a pinch of patience!

Rags to Dishes is a single player, virtual reality (VR) cooking game where you’ll have the chance to travel back in time to the medieval ages and serve some delicious dishes to hungry villagers!

Are you ready to cook your way to victory?

Website
https://novity-vr.com/games/rags-to-dishes/

Social Media
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RagsToDishes_VR
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ragstodishesvr/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RagstoDishesVR
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/RagstoDishes/
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/HDXYQhS

Developer
Novity: https://novity-vr.com
